description: Tennant Company provides a comprehensive line of walk-behind floor scrubber-dryers, including cord-electric and battery walk-behind micro scrubber-dryers and large area walk-behind scrubber-dryers. Use the T1B battery walk-behind micro scrubber-dryer to clean small, compact spaces, or the 5680 battery walk-behind scrubber-dryer for large industrial areas.
name: Scrubbers
